CustomField.description: This field contains cumulative external comments (from new_external_Comment__c field). Is populated via workflow. Should be read only on the page layouts. Created as per Case Update (External) Field For TRAX
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is for external facing customer updates for the Trax application. You can write to this field in the “Case Update (External)” option in the Activity & Chatter Panel. Click "More" if the option is not visible.
CustomField.label: Case Update (External)
